channel.title: www.DeviationX.org | VPS | Instant Switching | Economy | All skills
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/iLqtNJL.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=3]Information: [/B]DeviationX is an up and coming RSPS, 24/7 hosted on a no lag VPS. We are an excellent PK server, with strong foundations for an economy. There are goals to work towards, reasons to skill, there are plenty of minigames to play, and soon to be plenty of players to kill. Join today and get ahead of the economy, set yourself as one of the more powerful players.
[URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/dxjn3txwrni3tkk/Deviationx.jar?dl=1"]Click here to download the client now![/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.deviationx.org/vote"]Click here to vote for us! It would help a ton![/URL]
[spoiler=Content] [ul][*]Auto-donation and Auto-vote [*]Strong economy [*]No dupes [*]Minigames (including castle wars) [*]Working random events (shooting star) [*]Curses, chaoitcs, nex armour, primal armour [*]PVP armour [*]Completionist, Max and Veteran cape [*]Spirit shields [*]Vote points shop [*]No lag, 24/7 hosted [*]Plenty of bosses [*]Boss pets [*]Lottery [*]Gambling [*]Working duel arena [*]Working fight pits [*]Full wave fight caves [*]Overloads and extremes [*]Working combat system, instant switching for hybridding[/ul]
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media]New dicing system! [img]https://i.gyazo.com/f807e0ffa071fb0aa1e8bbb0ca717f6f.png[/img]
Safe PKing! [img]https://i.gyazo.com/5d91e12649ca9345d743b7e518a48e57.png[/img]
Agile armour - a mix of Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan armour, only available to Maxed players. [img]https://i.gyazo.com/ee02264a5c11c311f2caa37d329fea38.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/439d0f035da94294303a7cb44f23051f.gif[/img]
Random event: shooting star [img]https://i.gyazo.com/5f0d0ae5ede5edc23fc296b158e5ffd0.gif[/img]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqJ0MDSL3v0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqJ0MDSL3v0[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cPGnRjuPy4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cPGnRjuPy4[/url] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Support us!]Copy and paste this code into your signature!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/iLqtNJL.png]http://i.imgur.com/iLqtNJL.png[/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5482174/cooltext159617652902844.png]https://www.upload.ee/image/5482174/cooltext159617652902844.png[/url] [url=http://i67.tinypic.com/2l278.png]http://i67.tinypic.com/2l278.png[/url]
[img]http://i67.tinypic.com/2l278.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iLqtNJL.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5482174/cooltext159617652902844.png[/img] [/spoiler][/CENTER]

item.description:
@DeviationX wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=3]Information: DeviationX is an up and coming RSPS, 24/7 hosted on a no lag VPS. We are an excellent PK server, with strong foundations for an economy. There are goals to work towards, reasons to skill, there are plenty of minigames to play, and soon to be plenty of players to kill.
Join today and get ahead of the economy, set yourself as one of the more powerful players.

Click here to download the client now!

Click here to vote for us! It would help a ton!

[spoiler=Content]
[ul][]Auto-donation and Auto-vote
[]Strong economy
[]No dupes
[]Minigames (including castle wars)
[]Working random events (shooting star)
[]Curses, chaoitcs, nex armour, primal armour
[]PVP armour
[]Completionist, Max and Veteran cape
[]Spirit shields
[]Vote points shop
[]No lag, 24/7 hosted
[]Plenty of bosses
[]Boss pets
[]Lottery
[]Gambling
[]Working duel arena
[]Working fight pits
[]Full wave fight caves
[]Overloads and extremes
[]Working combat system, instant switching for hybridding[/ul]

[/spoiler]

Safe PKing!
